definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: Limitedly resistant to strong acid, strong alkali, strong oxidizing solution and strong solvent.
sentences.chinese: 而且更具有很高的熱穩定性，抗強鹼性及抗強溶劑性。

sentences.english: Acid or alkaline solutions, water, grease, Inorganic material, oxidizer.
sentences.chinese: 或強鹼溶液，水分，油脂，無機物，強氧化劑。

sentences.english: It also has a high degree of thermal stability, resistance to strong alkaline environments, and high solvent resistance.
sentences.chinese: 而且更具有很高的熱穩定性，抗強鹼性及抗強溶劑性。

sentences.english: The nanometer tetragonal polycrystal zirconia powder was prepared by the super alkaline method at low temperature.
sentences.chinese: 利用低溫超強鹼法制備出了納米四方多晶氧化鋯粉體。

sentences.english: It is recommended as a hydrotrope for use in highly alkaline systems where low foam is desirable.
sentences.chinese: 建議作爲助水溶劑用於要求低泡沫的強鹼性系統。

sentences.english: Monel is also very resistant to strong caustic solutions.
sentences.chinese: 蒙乃爾對於強鹼也具有很好的耐腐蝕性。

sentences.english: Various iodinated strong base quaternary ammonium anion exchange resins were prepared.
sentences.chinese: 製備了數種不同的強鹼型陰離子碘化樹脂。

sentences.english: Strong acids always cause more damage to skin than strong base of same concentrations.
sentences.chinese: 強酸比同一濃度的強鹼更能對皮膚夠造成更大傷害。

sentences.english: Calcium hydroxide is an alkali almost not hard dissolved in water .
sentences.chinese: 氫氧化鈣是一種幾乎不容於誰的難溶性強鹼。

sentences.english: First the wool shearings are boiled up in a strong lye for some hours.
sentences.chinese: 首先將這些碎的邊角料用強鹼水煮幾個小時。

sentences.english: FPM is not recommended for most strong alkali solutions.
sentences.chinese: FPM不適用於大多數強鹼溶液。
